articles.author: Colleen Goko, Kopano Gumbi
articles.description: Another no-show by U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, Donald Trump's tariff threats and rising tensions between Washington and BRICS countries all look set to overshadow this week's meeting of G20 finance chiefs in Durban, South Africa.
articles.title: Bessent no-show, BRICS tensions set to cast shadow over Durban G20 meeting
